r.d: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices. Currently supported output targets include the X Window System, Quartz, Win32, image buffers, PostScript, PDF, and SVG file output.
r.n: * Added support for Cairo 1.10 subsurfaces * Added support for Cairo 1.10 recording surfaces * Added other Cairo 1.10 methods * Fix bug relating to strides for image data * Allow compiling all the way back to Cairo 1.2 * Win32 font support * Handle construction and destruction of globals correctly
